meanings.sent1: She looked unwell after staying up all night.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed rest for the unwell patient.
meanings.sent3: Even superheroes can feel unwell sometimes.
meanings.sent4: The unwell plant needed more sunlight to thrive.
meanings.sent5: The unwell puppy whimpered softly in its bed.

meanings.sent1: He felt unwell and decided to see a doctor.
meanings.sent2: The unwell child was taken to the hospital for treatment.
meanings.sent3: The unwell computer needed a tech-savvy friend to fix it.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt unwell with worry about the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent5: The unwell tree shed its leaves prematurely in the dry season.

meanings.definition: Feeling sick or under the weather.
meanings.sent1: She called in sick to work feeling unwell.
meanings.sent2: The unwell student missed class to rest at home.
meanings.sent3: The unwell car sputtered and coughed on the highway.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt unwell with uncertainty about the future.
meanings.sent5: The unwell sky darkened with approaching storm clouds.
